conbody.p: tutorialprerequisitesBefore you start this tutorial, you'll need to do a few things:

ol.li:
Download sample data.
You can download sample data from the following location: verify the link
https://www.streamsets.com/documentation/datacollector/sample_data/tutorial/nyc_taxi_data.csv
You'll need a login to the password-protected section of the site - it just takes a moment to set up an account.

Set up directories local to the .
Let's use the same root directory for the origin, destination, and error files as follows:
/<base directory>/tutorial/origin
/<base directory>/tutorial/destination
/<base directory>/tutorial/error Make sure the user who started the has read and write permission for the directories.
and then and save the sample data in the origin directory.
The should be installed and running.

To create and run the pipeline, you should have a login with the admin role or both the creator and manager roles.
If you haven't set up custom user accounts, you can use the admin account shipped with the . Login: admin / admin.
